CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Case__c)) && ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Case__r.ClosedDate), TEXT(HRCSVC_Case__r.Status), IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Work_Order__c)), CASE(HRCSVC_Work_Order__r.Status, "SA", "Open - Service Order", "SB", "Waiting on Parts - Service Order", "SC","Complete - Service Order", "SE","Cancelled - Service Order", "SP","Printed - Service Order", "ST","Troubleshooting Complete", "SS","Suspended - Service Order", "No Value"), IF(NOT(ISBLANK(HRCSVC_Case__c)), TEXT(HRCSVC_Case__r.Status), "No Case or Work Order Attached" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Resolution Status
